name: iPhone 12
description: The latest smartphone from Apple, featuring a Super Retina XDR display, 5G capability, and a Ceramic Shield front cover.

name: MacBook Pro
description: A powerful laptop with a stunning Retina display, the latest processors, and all-day battery life.

name: HP OfficeJet Pro 9015
description: A reliable all-in-one printer that can print, scan, copy, and fax documents and features automatic document feeding and two-sided printing.

name: Fitbit Charge 4
description: A fitness tracker with GPS, a heart rate monitor, and built-in Amazon Alexa capabilities.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: A high-performance smartphone with a sleek design, 5G capability, and a triple camera system.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: A lightweight laptop with a stunning InfinityEdge display and long battery life, perfect for on-the-go productivity.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
description: A versatile 2-in-1 laptop that can be used as a tablet, featuring a high-resolution touch screen and a detachable keyboard.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: Noise-cancelling headphones with a comfortable, over-ear design and Google Assistant built-in.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: A wireless mouse with a comfortable, ergonomic design and advanced features like gesture control and a 4000 DPI sensor.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD
description: A fast and reliable external hard drive with a compact, portable design and optional password protection.
